meanings.sent1: She miswrote the address on the envelope.
meanings.sent2: He often miswrote words in his essays due to rushing.
meanings.sent3: The teacher chuckled when she saw how he miswrote the math problem.
meanings.sent4: Her tired mind miswrote the lyrics of the song, creating a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent5: The miswrote sign on the door led to confusion among the guests.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she miswrote the recipe for the cake.
meanings.sent2: He miswrote the note, causing confusion for the recipient.
meanings.sent3: The miswrote message made her friend laugh at the misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: His miswrote entry in the diary changed the course of events.
meanings.sent5: The miswrote password locked him out of his own account.
